Name: Common Cold
Synynom: Upper Respiratory Tract;Nose and Throat Infection
Symptoms: Runny nose;stuffy nose;sore throat;cough;congestion;body aches;sneezing
Treatment: Stay hydrated;rest;sooth a sore throat using saltwater gargle;take over the counter cold and cough medications

Name: Allergies
Symptoms: Eye irritation;runny stuffy nose;puffy watery eyes;sneezing;inflamed;itchy nose; itchy throat
Treatment:
Remove the cause of allergy; 
otherwise take Antihistamines to relieve sneezing;Decongestants to relieve congestions in nasal membranes;Anti inflamary agents to reduce;Allergy shots

Name: Conjunctivitis
Symptoms: Redness eyes;red eye;itchy eyes;eyeball tearing burning sensation
Treatment: See a doctor;Bacterial cases can be treated with antibiotic eye drops;Allergic reactions can be treated with other eye drops

Name: Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS)
Symptoms: Watery, loose stools;frequent bowel movement;stomachache nausea;bloody stool
Treatment: Diarrhea will typically go away in 2 days;Consult a physician if you experience severe stomach or rectum pain, fever, or diarrhea lasting longer than 3 days

Name: Acute Headache
Symptoms: Intense pain oneside brain;short duration;nausea
Treatment: Sleep and rest;Icepack over eyes or head;Moderate use of OTC medicines such as acetaminophen, aspirin, or ibuprofen may relieve pain

Name: Chronic Headache
Symptoms: Constant dull headache;long term
Treatment: Sleep and rest;icepack over eyes or head;Note: overuse of pain relieving medicines may result in "analgesic rebound headaches"

Name: Intestinal Gas
Symptoms: Stomach pain;swallowed air;undigested food
Treatment: Take digestive enzyme supplements, such as Beano and lactase supplements;Eat several small meals throughout the day instead of two or three large ones;Take a stroll after each meal

Name: Nausea and Vomiting
Symptoms: Abdominal cramps;watery diarrhea;nausea;vomiting
Treatment: Most cases resolve within a couple days without treatments;Avoid food and water that may be contaminated;Wash your hands thoroughly and frequently;Avoid sharing eating utencils

Name: E Coli Infection
Symptoms: nausea;vomiting;headache;mild fever;severe stomach cramps; watery;bloody diarrhea
Treatment: Visit a hospital immediately

Name: Chlamydia
Symptoms: vaginal discharge;burning sensation;pain lower abdomen;pain during sex;vaginal bleeding between periods;bleeding after intercourse;discharge from penis;burning itching penis;pain testicles;swelling testicles
Treatment: See a professional doctor;Use Azithromycin or Doxycycline

Name: Influenza
Symptoms: fever;cough;muscle aches;headache;chills;loss appetite;chills;fatigue;sore throat; runny nose; stuffy nose; stomach ache;diarrhea;vomiting
Treatment: Mild flu treated with rest and fluids; See a doctor in the case of severe flu

Name: Hepatitis B
Symptoms: sores penis;sores vagina;tender lumps groin
Treatment: See a doctor immediately;Take antiviral drugs

Name: HBV;Liver infection
Symptoms: Fever;Fatigue;Loss of appetite;Nausea;Vomiting;Abdominal pain;Dark urine;Clay-colored bowel movement;joint pain;Jaundice
Treatment: See a doctor immediately;Take antiviral drugs for chronic HBV;No medication is availiable for acute infection

Name: Avian Influenza
Symptoms: high fever;cough;aching muscles;sore throat;stomach pain;chest pain;diarrhea;difficulty breathing;pneumonia;acute respiratory distress syndrome
Treatment: Seek help from a professional healthcare provider immediately

Name: Swine Influenza
Symptoms: Fever;cough;sore throat;runny nose;stuffy nose;watery eyes;red eyes;body aches;headache;fatigue;diarrhea;nausea;vomiting
Treatment: Recommended medicines for swine influenza are oseltamivir, peramivir, and zanamivir

Name: Dermatitis
Symptoms: inflammation skin;redness;heat;swelling;pain
Treatment: Compress;corticosteroid cream;calcineurin inhibitors;See a doctor for further assistance

Name: West Nile Virus
Symptoms: fever;headache;body aches;mild rash;swollen lymph glands;rapid severe headache;high fever;stiff neck;nausea;vomiting;difficulty swallowing;drowsiness;confusion;loss consciousness;lack coordination;muscle weakness;paralysis
Treatment: Please see a healthcare professional;There are no specific treatments for West Nile Virus in humans

Name: Zika Virus
Symptoms: red eyes;weakness;headaches;lack energy;joint swelling;low grade fever;simple fever;mild fever;red rash
Treatment: Get plenty of rest;drink fluid;take medicine such as acetaminophen;Consult with a professional doctor

Name: Chickenpox
Symptoms: fever;aching muscles;loss appetite;rash;spots;blisters;clouding;mouth soreness;itchiness
Treatment: Drink plenty of fluid;Take Tylenol;Consult with a doctor

Name: Alzheimer
Symptoms: Memory loss;difficulty planning; difficulty solving problems;difficulty completing familiar tasks;confusion time;confusion place;difficulties understanding visual images;difficulty understanding spatial relationships;problems speaking writing;misplacing things;decreased judgement;withdrawal activities;change personality
Treatment: Cholinesterase inhibitors;Memantine(Namenda);Please consult with a professional doctor

Name: Pregrancy
Symptoms: Tender,swollen breats;fatigue;slight bleeding cramping;missing period;bloating;constipation;crying;gas;mood swings; back pain
Treatment: You are pregnant! Remember to take your prenatal vitamin;quit smoking;stop drinking alcohol;cut down on caffeine; avoid hazardous foods;eat well and sleep well!

Name: Stroke
Symptoms: sudden numbness weakness face, arm leg;sudden confusion;sudden trouble seeing;sudden dizziness
Treatment: See a healthcare professional immediately

Name: Eating Disorders including Anorexia & Bulimia Nervosa
Symptoms: Chronic restrictive eating dieting;rapid weight loss;calories fat obsession;fixation food;depression;cold sensation;hloss
Treatment: Seek help from a therapist, physician, and nutritionist

Name: Coronary Heart Disease
Symptoms: chest pain;indigestion;heatburn;weak nausea;cramping;breath shortness
Treatment: quit smoking;have a healthy diet;exercise regularly;consult with a doctor

Name: Sleep Apnea
Symptoms: Waking up sore;dry throat;loud snoring;sleepiness;lack of energy;morning headaches;restless sleep;forgetfulness;mood change;recurrent awakening
Treatment: Losing weight;avoiding alcohol and sleeping pills;changing sleeping position to improve breathing;stop smoking;avoid sleeping on your back

Name: Crohn's Disease
Symptoms: diarrhea;fever;fatigue;abdominal pain;cramping;blood in your stool;mouth sores;reduced appetite;weight loss;anus pain; drainage near anus
Treatment: If you have persistent changes in your bowel habits or have the following conditions, see a doctor: Abdominal pain;blood in your stool;ongoing bouts of diarrhea that don't respond to OTC medication;unexplained fever lasting over two days;unexplained weight loss

Name: Breast Cancer
Symptoms: armpist pain;breast adnormal change;red breast;nipples rash;nipple discharge;sunken inverted nipple;change breast size;change breast shape;peeling flaking scaling breast nipple skin
Treatment: You may have breast cancer, please consult with a doctor and conduct further diagnostics at your local hospital

Name: Prostate Cancer
Symptoms: frequent urinate;difficulty urination;urinate blood;red urine;painful urination;pain ejaculation;difficulty erection
Treatment: You may have prostate cancer, please consult with a doctor and conduct further diagnostics at your local hospital
